abstract: Bits is following reaction to the death of Steven P. Jobs, the visionary co-founder and former chief executive of Apple, who has died at 56.
snippet: Bits is following reaction to the death of Steven P. Jobs, the visionary co-founder and former chief executive of Apple, who has died at 56.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday night, Bits followed reaction to the death of Steven P. Jobs, the visionary co-founder and former chief executive of Apple, who has died at 56.
